title: 1 RP
body: Hey Riot, I am 1 RP away from 1350. I have exactly 1349 RP, and since im in college, I have no money to spend on RP anymore. Anyway you can give me 1? lol

replies.body: Hey, we might be able to work something out here!  Draw us a picture of a poro enjoying the summer, and maybe we can help!

wait, like on paper? or with computer commands?
Ill get on it right away, take me a bit. 

My Art Degree is coming in handy already.

How might i give you my fantastic Poro that I made in Microsoft Paint?

edit: AH HA
http://imgur.com/a/1g7ly

hmm, its not showing :c
 edit 4: FINALLY XD

Oh wow!  You did this, and in paint??  This is incredible!  I will print and frame it!  Thank you!  What were you looking to unlock?  In my excitement, you might find that RP has been added to your account!

(It is now my wallpaper!)

I did manage to do this in Paint, I don't have the luxury of owning Adobe Illustrator yet and I had no clean paper (somehow), so I took 30 minutes to make a Poro (had nothing better to do).  To be honest I wasn't looking to buy anything right off the bat, but I am always waiting for a new Rengar skin so I can buy it. However, I am tempted to buy Dark Star Kha'zix right now, its a very pretty skin.

Thanks for the RP and thanks for liking it so much xD, im glad you got a kick out of it.

Hey, Porocles!

I drew my SKT T1 Jhin before a week ago and I don't know where and how to send it to you?
I post Discussion about it, but no one helped me and I feel ignored.
Would you tell me, please?

We're always available through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) submission, as well as email via support@riotgames.com.  Reach out to us with your inquiry and we'll respond back as soon as we can!
i might sound a little greedy but i want 2 rp to buy a chroma for urgot . i drew teemo for the memes XD but i dont know how to send it
this a pretty old post, dont know if they monitor it, maybe try making a new post?
